thread.title: All about Parth Samthaan's comeback episode in Kaisi Yeh Yaariyan season 2!
thread.title_full: All about Parth Samthaan's comeback episode in Kaisi Yeh Yaariyan season 2! | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna webdesk
title: All about Parth Samthaan's comeback episode in Kaisi Yeh Yaariyan season 2!
text:
Parth Samthaan had grabbed headlines after he announced that he's quitting Kaisi Yeh Yaariyan . After the first season ended in a bomb blast scene, we had exclusively told you that Parth has decided to discontinue with the show. Soon enough, Parth announced his exit from the show and broke million hearts nationwide.
After a lot of outrage on digital forums, the channel decided to get Parth back on the show. This time, he did agree! Yet again, he took to Twitter and his Instagram to make the special announcement. The actor started shooting on September 30 and here's all you need to know about his much awaited comeback on the show!
When is it airing?
A source informs us, "Parth shot for the episode last week and it will be aired this week, that is in Wednesday's episode."
How will it be planned out?
While the first season ended with the bomb blast scene, there has been no clue about Parth's character yet on the show. The second season is already underway and now that Parth has shot for the episode, people are more eager to know how the makers are planning his comeback on the show. So here it goes. Our source reveals, "Niti Taylor aka Nandini will start dreaming and hallucinating about Manik tomorrow. She will remember all the nice moments spent with Parth." But if you think it will be a scene which you have already seen before, think again! "The scenes that you will see are completely new and were shot just last week."
When will he join permanently?
This week's KYY 2 episode will just be a trailer to what's in store for the audiences in the coming weeks. "The fans were going crazy about Parth leaving the show. So this episode will give them a glimpse of their favourite star. After this, he will officially re-enter the show as Manik again in any of the next few week's episode."
